summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5642 for the improvement of West Bertona Street, from West Viewmont Way to 38th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74402, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
